<div style>In an ecosystem with one single server an=
d custom build clients (Twitter clients for instance) there really is no ne=
ed for media types/uniform interface: the client can safely assume that the=
 server is going to return JSON in one specific flavor each and every time =
the client makes a request to it. Neither is hyper media of much relevance =
since it is quite safe to assume that the server won't change its URL s=
tructure.</div>
